NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 PLUME: Friends, I shall be traveling to Ember Twin with Phlox soon, ahead of your expedition. Might you have any suggestions on how we might protect ourselves from the terrible heat from the sun? 2 1 MELORAE: Goodness, Plume! Have we not shared the news with you? Young Oeno has engineered a new version of our spacesuits to shelter us from intense heat - you must don them before you depart! 3 2 MELORAE: The expedition team to the forested planet discovered new natural resources native to the planet, which appear to have fantastically heat-resistant properties. 4 3 MELORAE: Oeno was able to integrate these new materials into our spacesuits, greatly improving their durability and insulative properties. 5 3 MELORAE: In other words, this new suit should make the heat on Ember Twin far more bearable during your work on Ember Twin! 6 5 COLEUS: Imagine if we had such wondrous equipment when we were constructing that device on Ember Twin's surface, Melorae! 6 5 MELORAE: Then I imagine we would begin to miss the sun on this stormy, sunless planet.. Which I must say, I absolutely have not! 6 5 PLUME: You have my deepest gratitude for informing me about these new spacesuits, friends. And I can only further admire your tenacity, working on Ember Twin's surface without such protection!
